segments.text: Excuse me , miss . Could I have something to drink , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Is it possible to get a beer ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Why don ’ t you have a water or juice instead , so you don ’ t get dehydrated ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You ’ re right . I ’ ll save the beer for when we land . One orange juice , please .
segments.speaker: S1
